paper.title: Cognitive Compliance: Assessing Regulatory Risk in Financial Advice Documents
paper.abstract: This paper describes Cognitive Compliance - a solution that automates the complex manual process of assessing regulatory compliance of personal financial advice. The solution uses natural language processing (NLP), machine learning and deep learning to characterise the regulatory risk status of personal financial advice documents with traffic light rating for various risk factors. This enables comprehensive coverage of the review and rapid identification of documents at high risk of non-compliance with government regulations.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要研究使用自然语言处理和机器学习技术自动化评估个人财务建议文件的监管合规性，虽然涉及金融领域，但其核心技术应用并不直接属于衍生品定价、金融风险管理或投资组合管理中的任何一个。
